column6: The star rider of the spaceways-the Silver Surfer--at war with an entire world of Marvel heroes-who happen to be zombies! How do you defeat an army of the super-powered Undead, even with the Power Cosmic? There's only one way to find out. Don't miss it!
column8: | letterer:Randy Gentile | writer:Robert Kirkman | penciller:Sean Phillips | penciller (cover):Arthur Suydam
